body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Olivia Smith and I'm a customer service representative at AutoWorld. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Samantha Johnson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Samantha. Could you please provide me with the first three digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the first three digits are five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also tell me the last two digits of your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last two digits are eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Samantha.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time in providing those details. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Thank you, Samantha.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, have a great day.
